mapper.update: update sea_cck set ckey = #{ckey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, climit = #{climit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maketime = #{maketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, usetime = #{usetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ckey, climit, maketime, usetime, uname, status from sea_cck
